snippet: A police officer responding to a report of a suspicious person was fatally shot at a suburban mall on Wednesday, and the police said the suspect was charged with murder.
abstract: Police Officer Greg Alia is fatally shot while confronting Jarvis Hall, suspect in a shooting, at Richland Mall in South Carolina; Hall is charged with murder.
lead_paragraph: A police officer responding to a report of a suspicious person was fatally shot at a suburban mall on Wednesday, and the police said the suspect was charged with murder.

headline.main: South Carolina: Officer Killed in Shooting at Mall
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Officer Killed in Shooting at Mall
